product_name: Keokee Co. Publishing Inc On the Trail of the Ice Age Floods: A Geological Field Guide to the Mid-Columbia Basin
long_description: This guidebook explains the geological features of the Columbia River Basin in eastern Washington as regards the cataclysmic forces that formed them.
short_description: This guidebook explains the geological features of the Columbia River Basin in eastern Washington as regards the cataclysmic forces that formed them.
